attributes.action: Put health warnings on vape packaging
attributes.additional_details: Vaping is proven to be highly addictive especially with the younger generation. Adding health warnings could help to decrease the amount of young people who decide to start vaping
attributes.background: Force vape manufacturers to remove the colourful packaging and replace it with health warnings

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition that calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631999
